document_data.name: Flash grenade
document_data.creator: [[Deep gnome]]s
document_data.mainbody: '''Flash grenades''' were a type of non-lethal explosive developed by [[deep gnome]]s that disoriented and blinded foes.
document_data.Description: These explosives were about the size of a [[chicken]] [[egg]] and were fragile.
document_data.Powers: In order to be set off, a flash grenade had to thrown onto a fire source. Once set off, these grenades exploded out into a brilliant flare of light. creatures with eyes sensitive to strong lights, such as the [[drow]] and many denizens of the [[Underdark]], were especially affected by this flash.
